path-mode.description: Whether the binding value is a path

multiple.description: Whether it is a multi-select state (search is enabled by default in multi-select mode)
multiple.description_zh: 是否为多选状态（多选模式默认开启搜索）

v-model.type: string| number| Record<string, any>| ( | string | number | Record<string, any> | (string | number | Record<string, any>)[] )[]| undefined

default-value.type: string| number| Record<string, any>| ( | string | number | Record<string, any> | (string | number | Record<string, any>)[] )[]| undefined

error.description: Whether it is in an error state

size.description: Select the size of the box

v-model:input-value.description: Enter a value for the field

default-input-value.description: Default value for input field (uncontrolled state)
default-input-value.description_zh: 输入框的默认值（非受控状态）

v-model:popup-visible.description: Whether to display a drop-down box

expand-trigger.description: Expand the trigger method for the next level
expand-trigger.description_zh: 展开下一级的触发方式

default-popup-visible.description: Whether the drop-down box is displayed by default (uncontrolled)
default-popup-visible.description_zh: 是否默认显示下拉框（非受控状态）

:max-tag-count.description: In multi-select mode, the maximum number of labels displayed. 0 indicates no limit
:max-tag-count.description_zh: 多选模式下，最多显示的标签数量。0 表示不限制

:trigger-props.description: Trigger properties of the drop-down menu
:trigger-props.description_zh: 下拉菜单的触发器属性

check-strictly.description: Whether to enable strict selection mode
check-strictly.description_zh: 是否开启严格选择模式

:load-more.type: ( option: CascaderOption, done: (children?: CascaderOption[]) => void) => void
:load-more.description: Lazy loading function, enable the lazy loading function when data is in
:load-more.description_zh: 数据懒加载函数，传入时开启懒加载功能

loading.description: Whether it is in the Loading state

search-option-only-label.description: Search whether the options in the drop-down menu show only tags
search-option-only-label.description_zh: 搜索下拉菜单中的选项是否仅展示标签

:search-delay.description: The delay in triggering the search event
:search-delay.description_zh: 触发搜索事件的延迟时间

:field-names.description_zh: 自定义 CascaderOption 中的字段

value-key.description: The name of the attribute used to determine the value of the option key
value-key.description_zh: 用于确定选项键值的属性名

fallback.type: boolean| (( value: | string | number | Record<string, unknown> | (string | number | Record<string, unknown>)[] ) => string)
fallback.description: Customize the display of values for non-existent options
fallback.description_zh: 自定义不存在选项的值的展示

:virtual-list-props.description: Pass the virtual list property with this parameter to turn on virtual scrolling VirtualListProps
:virtual-list-props.description_zh: 传递虚拟列表属性，传入此参数以开启虚拟滚动 VirtualListProps

CascaderOption.name: value
CascaderOption.description: 选项值，2.29.0 版本支持对象

slots.name: empty
slots.description: 选项为空时的显示内容
slots.description_zh: 选项为空时的显示内容
